text:
[Verse]
Wake up in the morning
Feel the sunlight glow
Chasing all my worries
Let the good vibes flow

[Verse 2]
Walking down the sidewalk
Smiles in the air
Summer breeze is talking
Love is everywhere

[Chorus]
Sunshine dreams are flying
High above the sky
Never gonna stop now
Feel like I can fly

[Verse 3]
Dancing in the daylight
Music in my soul
Every beat is magic
Let the rhythm roll

[Bridge]
Hold on to the moment
Never let it fade
In this world of wonder
Every joy's a shade

[Chorus]
Sunshine dreams are flying
High above the sky
Never gonna stop now
Feel like I can fly
title: Sunshine Dreams
